sentences.english: Is Federer at least safe at No. 2?
sentences.chinese: 費德勒至少是穩獲年終第二了吧？

sentences.english: You'll get bonus at the end of each year.
sentences.chinese: 年底你會得到年終獎金。

sentences.english: At the year's end they were then pleasantly surprised by the "extra" business they received.
sentences.chinese: 年終時他們爲“超額”完成的銷售，感到驚訝而高興。

sentences.english: I'm still not guaranteed to finish at No. 3.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然沒有確保年終第三位。

sentences.english: All the workers hired by the factory can get a year-end bonus.
sentences.chinese: 工廠裏所有的在聘職工都可以領到年終獎金。

sentences.english: What do you expect for your year-end bonus?
sentences.chinese: 你對年終獎有什麼期待？

sentences.english: For romance or adventure? What are you going to do with your annual bonus?
sentences.chinese: 浪漫還是冒險，你的年終獎怎麼花？

sentences.english: Cathy:Which have the highest year-end bonuses?
sentences.chinese: 哪些職業有高年終獎金呢？

sentences.english: We wonder whether you would be willing to attend our end-of-the-year party.
sentences.chinese: 不知道您能否賞光，參加我們的年終聯歡會。

sentences.english: Are we going to have award ceremony at the Annual Party?
sentences.chinese: 我們年終宴會上會有頒獎儀式嗎？

sentences.english: Clara's family would have stuffed artichokes for the holidays.
sentences.chinese: 在年終節日期間，克萊拉全家會喫填餡洋薊。

sentences.english: The workers expected to share out a year-end bonus.
I finished my end -of -year exams last week and got my report card today.
sentences.chinese: 上週我結束了年終考試，今天我得到了我的成績單。

sentences.english: Staffs can all get the rewarding money in the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 所有的在職員工都可以領到年終獎金。

sentences.english: Sam: Actually, I'd like to present you with your annual bonus.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我想親自把年終獎金拿給你。

sentences.english: Stock-market prices dipped to a low point at the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 年終時股市價格降至低點。

definition: to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer
